method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the StoryWindow.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the StoryWindow with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the StoryWindow with the specified name.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the StoryWindows within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The StoryWindow, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: StoryWindow, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The StoryWindow, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: StoryWindow, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first StoryWindow in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last StoryWindow in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle StoryWindow in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the StoryWindow with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The index of the StoryWindow that follows the desired StoryWindow.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the StoryWindow whose index follows the specified StoryWindow in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The StoryWindow whose index comes before the desired StoryWindow.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any StoryWindow in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every StoryWindow in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the StoryWindow.
Returns the StoryWindow with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
